title: Display your jungle dominance with Gromp

replies.body:
Why can't Summoner Icons be sold for IP? Or have some sort of task which then rewards you with it, you know, like, kill 50 gromps for the gromp icon. I think this would make it more fun. Surely you get enough money from the millions buying RP and you don't need that extra 250RP...

Just a thought.
yeah now i have to legit go out and buy rp for my favourite man ever, gromp
this gromp icon should replace one of the normal free icons
No, Gromp icon should replace every icon. Just of Gromp doing different poses.
he's totes adorbs... if death is your thing. *cue zelda secret item sound*
>if only we could get the journal of justice back
just make jg beter
Yeah take out Blue, Red, Wolves, Krugs and birdies, and replace them all with Gromps different kinds of Gromp, of course but still Gromp.
Remind me why I should pay 250 RP for this?
Gromp is not the only toxic toad on the rift...
I shall live and die by the Gromp.
We shall all, my brother. {{item:3060}}
I like icons!!! I have my BARON ONE HAHAHAHHA {{champion:432}}
if only i cared about a stupid icon... where is EKKO!

He's probably comming out in the next patch... Just like every other champion they've ever previewed for us. 

Ao'Shin doesn't count; that was a teaser not a preview.
He comes out with the patch on the 27th if you read any pbe stuff.
hope it is a godd ability set
NEWS!!! WHY U NO SAY EKKO RELEASE!!!!!!!!!
Its gruul not gromp get it right riot.
wtf rito r u that money hungry? why are all the wolf and wraith icons free but these one 250 RP? whats with the days where all the SR icons were free?
Yeah poor Gromp.
This icon is ugly :( lol should be a free icon tbh

ITS NOT UGLY, HOW DARE THEE CALL OUR LORD AND SAVIOUR GROMP UGLY.
but it should be free

Have you heard of our lord and saviour Gromp,
He sacrifiecs himself to junglers every day to ensure victory and in return we must pray to Gromp

lol who in their right mind would purchase an icon?
Personally I restrict RP to champion skins, ward skins, and rune pages.
